## vscode 插件 new222

# koroFileHeader

- 保存代码时自动添加头信息
  > 设置 setting.json
  > `
  > "fileheader.customMade": {
      "LastEditors": "Mark",
      "Description": "In User Settings Edit",
      "Author": "Mark",
      "Date": "Do not edit",
      "LastEditTime": "Do not edit"
  },
  "fileheader.configObj": {
  "autoAdd": true,
  "beforeAnnotation": {
  "sh": "#!/bin/bash"
  },
  "annotationStr": {
  "head": "/_",
  "middle": "_ @",
  "end": " \*/",
  "use": true
  }
  },
  `
